attributes.action: To launch a full and independent inquiry in to the incident on the 8th of August 2009 at Newcastle Central Train Station.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that Northumbria Police over-reacted.  Sunderland supporters were injured when not posing a threat to themselves, others or the police.

We say the accusations made by Northumbria Police and the subsequent investigation by the Independent Police Complaints Commision (IPCC) was too quick and incomplete.

No eye-witnesses were interviewed before the judgement and the actions of the IPCC have already prejudiced the result of any further inquiry.

We therefore call for a full independent inquiry to take place and published detailing the full facts of this incident.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
